name: Google + Invite

name: FREE AppRebates Sign Up
description: Purchase and Download apps, Review, then get your money back with AppRebates! This is how it works: Browse the AppRebates Directory. First persue the directory for an app that catches your interest. They attract a wide range of apps and the selection is in constant rotation, so you're sure to find something up your alley. There are plenty of apps that have $0.50 or $1.00 bonuses that you get paid along with the amount you spent on the app you purchased which will be refunded to you. Download an app. Once you're intrigued by an offer, head over to the iPhone App Store to download it. From there, you'll be given a limited time to try the app out and review it. Get your money back and Get paid bonuses up to $1. Once they confirm your download, you'll be refunded with your choice of iTunes Gift cards or direct payment via PayPal. Enjoy your new paid app and keep the cash - high fives all around. ATTENTION! If interested, no need to purchase this item. Just go ahead and click here to sign up. If there's an invite you'd like to see here, contact us!
